text: Isaac William Marsh (1 February 1877 – 1949) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Doncaster Rovers, Gainsborough Trinity and Notts County. Marsh scored Doncaster Rovers' first Football League hat-trick which came in a 4–1 win against Chesterfield Town on 11 January 1902. ==References== Category:1877 births Category:1949 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:English Football League players Category:Burton Wanderers F.C. players Category:Northfleet United F.C. players Category:Gainsborough Trinity F.C. players Category:Notts County F.C. players Category:Newark Town F.C. players Category:Doncaster Rovers F.C. players Category:Worksop Town F.C. players Category:Denaby United F.C. players Category:Chesterfield F.C. players
title: Ike Marsh
